name: Domino Galaxy
description:
Domino Galaxy is a minimalist puzzle that uses domino pieces combined with a galaxy theme to promote a unique, enjoyable and relaxing atmosphere. Arrange the dominoes to connect like numbers and form a complete sequence, while basking at the dazzling stars of the universe.

How to play

Change the dominoes positions...


Spin the dominoes...


And form the correct sequence to win!

4 difficulty modes

  • 7 domino's - 50 Levels
  • 14 domino's - 50 Levels
  • 21 domino's - 50 Levels
  • 28 domino's - 50 Levels

Resources

  • Relaxing and immersive music
  • Minimalist art
  • Steam Cloud and Steam Achievements
